Hebrew: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר יְהוָ֖ה אֶל־מֹשֶׁ֥ה לֵּאמֹֽר׃
Translit: vaydhabbēr ʾadhōnåi ʾel-mōsheh lēʾmōr
English: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,

Hebrew: דַּבֵּר֙ אֶל־בְּנֵ֣י יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל וְיִקְחוּ־לִ֖י תְּרוּמָ֑ה מֵאֵ֤ת כָּל־אִישׁ֙ אֲשֶׁ֣ר יִדְּבֶ֣נּוּ לִבּ֔וֹ תִּקְח֖וּ אֶת־תְּרוּמָתִֽי׃
Translit: dabbēr ʾel-bənē yisråʾēl vəyiqḥū-lî tərūmåh mēʾēth kål-ʾîsh ʾasher yiddəvennū libbō tiqḥū ʾeth-tərūmåthî
English: Speak unto the children of Israel, that they bring me an offering: of every man that giveth it willingly with his heart ye shall take my offering.

Hebrew: וְזֹאת֙ הַתְּרוּמָ֔ה אֲשֶׁ֥ר תִּקְח֖וּ מֵאִתָּ֑ם זָהָ֥ב וָכֶ֖סֶף וּנְחֹֽשֶׁת׃
Translit: vəzōʾth hattərūmåh ʾasher tiqḥū mēʾittåm zåhåv våkhesef ūnəḥōsheth
English: And this is the offering which ye shall take of them; gold, and silver, and brass,

Hebrew: וּתְכֵ֧לֶת וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן וְתוֹלַ֥עַת שָׁנִ֖י וְשֵׁ֥שׁ וְעִזִּֽים׃
Translit: ūthəkhēleth vəʾargåmån vəthōlaʿath shånî vəshēsh vəʿizzîm
English: And blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine linen, and goats' hair,

Hebrew: וְעֹרֹ֨ת אֵילִ֧ם מְאָדָּמִ֛ים וְעֹרֹ֥ת תְּחָשִׁ֖ים וַעֲצֵ֥י שִׁטִּֽים׃
Translit: vəʿōrōth ʾēlim məʾåddåmîm vəʿōrōth təḥåshîm vaʿatṣē shiṭṭîm
English: And rams' skins dyed red, and badgers' skins, and shittim wood,

Hebrew: שֶׁ֖מֶן לַמָּאֹ֑ר בְּשָׂמִים֙ לְשֶׁ֣מֶן הַמִּשְׁחָ֔ה וְלִקְטֹ֖רֶת הַסַּמִּֽים׃
Translit: shemen lammåʾōr bəsåmîm ləshemen hammishḥåh vəliqṭōreth hassammîm
English: Oil for the light, spices for anointing oil, and for sweet incense,

Hebrew: אַבְנֵי־שֹׁ֕הַם וְאַבְנֵ֖י מִלֻּאִ֑ים לָאֵפֹ֖ד וְלַחֹֽשֶׁן׃
Translit: ʾavnē-shōham vəʾavnē milluʾîm låʾēfōdh vəlaḥōshen
English: Onyx stones, and stones to be set in the ephod, and in the breastplate.

Hebrew: וְעָ֥שׂוּ לִ֖י מִקְדָּ֑שׁ וְשָׁכַנְתִּ֖י בְּתוֹכָֽם׃
Translit: vəʿåsū lî miqdåsh vəshåkhantî bəthōkhåm
English: And let them make me a sanctuary; that I may dwell among them.

Hebrew: כְּכֹ֗ל אֲשֶׁ֤ר אֲנִי֙ מַרְאֶ֣ה אוֹתְךָ֔ אֵ֚ת תַּבְנִ֣ית הַמִּשְׁכָּ֔ן וְאֵ֖ת תַּבְנִ֣ית כָּל־כֵּלָ֑יו וְכֵ֖ן תַּעֲשֽׂוּ׃
Translit: kəkhōl ʾasher ʾanî marʾeh ʾōthəkhå ʾēth tavnîth hammishkån vəʾēth tavnîth kål-kēlåv vəkhēn taʿasū
English: According to all that I shew thee, after the pattern of the tabernacle, and the pattern of all the instruments thereof, even so shall ye make it.

Hebrew: וְעָשׂ֥וּ אֲר֖וֹן עֲצֵ֣י שִׁטִּ֑ים אַמָּתַ֨יִם וָחֵ֜צִי אָרְכּ֗וֹ וְאַמָּ֤ה וָחֵ֨צִי֙ רָחְבּ֔וֹ וְאַמָּ֥ה וָחֵ֖צִי קֹמָתֽוֹ׃
Translit: vəʿåsū ʾarōn ʿatṣē shiṭṭîm ʾammåthayim våḥētṣî ʾårkō vəʾammåh våḥētṣî råḥbō vəʾammåh våḥētṣî qōmåthō
English: And they shall make an ark of shittim wood: two cubits and a half shall be the length thereof, and a cubit and a half the breadth thereof, and a cubit and a half the height thereof.

Hebrew: וְצִפִּיתָ֤ אֹתוֹ֙ זָהָ֣ב טָה֔וֹר מִבַּ֥יִת וּמִח֖וּץ תְּצַפֶּ֑נּוּ וְעָשִׂ֧יתָ עָלָ֛יו זֵ֥ר זָהָ֖ב סָבִֽיב׃
Translit: vətṣippîthå ʾōthō zåhåv ṭåhōr mibbayith ūmiḥūtṣ tətṣappennū vəʿåsîthå ʿålåv zēr zåhåv såvîv
English: And thou shalt overlay it with pure gold, within and without shalt thou overlay it, and shalt make upon it a crown of gold round about.

Hebrew: וְיָצַ֣קְתָּ לּ֗וֹ אַרְבַּע֙ טַבְּעֹ֣ת זָהָ֔ב וְנָ֣תַתָּ֔ה עַ֖ל אַרְבַּ֣ע פַּעֲמֹתָ֑יו וּשְׁתֵּ֣י טַבָּעֹ֗ת עַל־צַלְעוֹ֙ הָֽאֶחָ֔ת וּשְׁתֵּי֙ טַבָּעֹ֔ת עַל־צַלְע֖וֹ הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃
Translit: vəyåtṣaqtå lō ʾarbaʿ ṭabbəʿōth zåhåv vənåthattåh ʿal ʾarbaʿ paʿamōthåv ūshətē ṭabbåʿōth ʿal-tṣalʿō håʾeḥåth ūshətē ṭabbåʿōth ʿal-tṣalʿō hasshēnîth
English: And thou shalt cast four rings of gold for it, and put them in the four corners thereof; and two rings shall be in the one side of it, and two rings in the other side of it.

Hebrew: וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ בַדֵּ֖י עֲצֵ֣י שִׁטִּ֑ים וְצִפִּיתָ֥ אֹתָ֖ם זָהָֽב׃
Translit: vəʿåsîthå vaddē ʿatṣē shiṭṭîm vətṣippîthå ʾōthåm zåhåv
English: And thou shalt make staves of shittim wood, and overlay them with gold.

Hebrew: וְהֵֽבֵאתָ֤ אֶת־הַבַּדִּים֙ בַּטַּבָּעֹ֔ת עַ֖ל צַלְעֹ֣ת הָאָרֹ֑ן לָשֵׂ֥את אֶת־הָאָרֹ֖ן בָּהֶֽם׃
Translit: vəhēvēʾthå ʾeth-habbaddîm baṭṭabbåʿōth ʿal tṣalʿōth håʾårōn låsēʾth ʾeth-håʾårōn båhem
English: And thou shalt put the staves into the rings by the sides of the ark, that the ark may be borne with them.

Hebrew: בְּטַבְּעֹת֙ הָאָרֹ֔ן יִהְי֖וּ הַבַּדִּ֑ים לֹ֥א יָסֻ֖רוּ מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃
Translit: bəṭabbəʿōth håʾårōn yihyū habbaddîm lōʾ yåsurū mimmennū
English: The staves shall be in the rings of the ark: they shall not be taken from it.

Hebrew: וְנָתַתָּ֖ אֶל־הָאָרֹ֑ן אֵ֚ת הָעֵדֻ֔ת אֲשֶׁ֥ר אֶתֵּ֖ן אֵלֶֽיךָ׃
Translit: vənåthattå ʾel-håʾårōn ʾēth håʿēdhuth ʾasher ʾettēn ʾēlekhå
English: And thou shalt put into the ark the testimony which I shall give thee.

Hebrew: וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ כַפֹּ֖רֶת זָהָ֣ב טָה֑וֹר אַמָּתַ֤יִם וָחֵ֨צִי֙ אָרְכָּ֔הּ וְאַמָּ֥ה וָחֵ֖צִי רָחְבָּֽהּ׃
Translit: vəʿåsîthå khappōreth zåhåv ṭåhōr ʾammåthayim våḥētṣî ʾårkåhh vəʾammåh våḥētṣî råḥbåhh
English: And thou shalt make a mercy seat of pure gold: two cubits and a half shall be the length thereof, and a cubit and a half the breadth thereof.

Hebrew: וְעָשִׂ֛יתָ שְׁנַ֥יִם כְּרֻבִ֖ים זָהָ֑ב מִקְשָׁה֙ תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה אֹתָ֔ם מִשְּׁנֵ֖י קְצ֥וֹת הַכַּפֹּֽרֶת׃
Translit: vəʿåsîthå shənayim kəruvîm zåhåv miqshåh taʿaseh ʾōthåm misshənē qətṣōth hakkappōreth
English: And thou shalt make two cherubims of gold, of beaten work shalt thou make them, in the two ends of the mercy seat.

Hebrew: וַ֠עֲשֵׂה כְּר֨וּב אֶחָ֤ד מִקָּצָה֙ מִזֶּ֔ה וּכְרוּב־אֶחָ֥ד מִקָּצָ֖ה מִזֶּ֑ה מִן־הַכַּפֹּ֛רֶת תַּעֲשׂ֥וּ אֶת־הַכְּרֻבִ֖ים עַל־שְׁנֵ֥י קְצוֹתָֽיו׃
Translit: vaʿasēh kərūv ʾeḥådh miqqåtṣåh mizzeh ūkhərūv-ʾeḥådh miqqåtṣåh mizzeh min-hakkappōreth taʿasū ʾeth-hakkəruvîm ʿal-shənē qətṣōthåv
English: And make one cherub on the one end, and the other cherub on the other end: even of the mercy seat shall ye make the cherubims on the two ends thereof.

Hebrew: וְהָי֣וּ הַכְּרֻבִים֩ פֹּרְשֵׂ֨י כְנָפַ֜יִם לְמַ֗עְלָה סֹכְכִ֤ים בְּכַנְפֵיהֶם֙ עַל־הַכַּפֹּ֔רֶת וּפְנֵיהֶ֖ם אִ֣ישׁ אֶל־אָחִ֑יו אֶל־הַכַּפֹּ֔רֶת יִהְי֖וּ פְּנֵ֥י הַכְּרֻבִֽים׃
Translit: vəhåiū hakkəruvîm pōrəsē khənåfayim ləmaʿlåh sōkhəkhîm bəkhanfēhem ʿal-hakkappōreth ūfənēhem ʾîsh ʾel-ʾåḥîv ʾel-hakkappōreth yihyū pənē hakkəruvîm
English: And the cherubims shall stretch forth their wings on high, covering the mercy seat with their wings, and their faces shall look one to another; toward the mercy seat shall the faces of the cherubims be.

Hebrew: וְנָתַתָּ֧ אֶת־הַכַּפֹּ֛רֶת עַל־הָאָרֹ֖ן מִלְמָ֑עְלָה וְאֶל־הָ֣אָרֹ֔ן תִּתֵּן֙ אֶת־הָ֣עֵדֻ֔ת אֲשֶׁ֥ר אֶתֵּ֖ן אֵלֶֽיךָ׃
Translit: vənåthattå ʾeth-hakkappōreth ʿal-håʾårōn milmåʿlåh vəʾel-håʾårōn tittēn ʾeth-håʿēdhuth ʾasher ʾettēn ʾēlekhå
English: And thou shalt put the mercy seat above upon the ark; and in the ark thou shalt put the testimony that I shall give thee.

Hebrew: וְנוֹעַדְתִּ֣י לְךָ֮ שָׁם֒ וְדִבַּרְתִּ֨י אִתְּךָ֜ מֵעַ֣ל הַכַּפֹּ֗רֶת מִבֵּין֙ שְׁנֵ֣י הַכְּרֻבִ֔ים אֲשֶׁ֖ר עַל־אֲרֹ֣ן הָעֵדֻ֑ת אֵ֣ת כָּל־אֲשֶׁ֧ר אֲצַוֶּ֛ה אוֹתְךָ֖ אֶל־בְּנֵ֥י יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃
Translit: vənōʿadhtî ləkhå shåm vədhibbartî ʾittəkhå mēʿal hakkappōreth mibbēn shənē hakkəruvîm ʾasher ʿal-ʾarōn håʿēdhuth ʾēth kål-ʾasher ʾatṣavveh ʾōthəkhå ʾel-bənē yisråʾēl
English: And there I will meet with thee, and I will commune with thee from above the mercy seat, from between the two cherubims which are upon the ark of the testimony, of all things which I will give thee in commandment unto the children of Israel.

Hebrew: וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ שֻׁלְחָ֖ן עֲצֵ֣י שִׁטִּ֑ים אַמָּתַ֤יִם אָרְכּוֹ֙ וְאַמָּ֣ה רָחְבּ֔וֹ וְאַמָּ֥ה וָחֵ֖צִי קֹמָתֽוֹ׃
Translit: vəʿåsîthå shuləḥån ʿatṣē shiṭṭîm ʾammåthayim ʾårkō vəʾammåh råḥbō vəʾammåh våḥētṣî qōmåthō
English: Thou shalt also make a table of shittim wood: two cubits shall be the length thereof, and a cubit the breadth thereof, and a cubit and a half the height thereof.

Hebrew: וְצִפִּיתָ֥ אֹת֖וֹ זָהָ֣ב טָה֑וֹר וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ לּ֛וֹ זֵ֥ר זָהָ֖ב סָבִֽיב׃
Translit: vətṣippîthå ʾōthō zåhåv ṭåhōr vəʿåsîthå lō zēr zåhåv såvîv
English: And thou shalt overlay it with pure gold, and make thereto a crown of gold round about.

Hebrew: וְעָשִׂ֨יתָ לּ֥וֹ מִסְגֶּ֛רֶת טֹ֖פַח סָבִ֑יב וְעָשִׂ֧יתָ זֵר־זָהָ֛ב לְמִסְגַּרְתּ֖וֹ סָבִֽיב׃
Translit: vəʿåsîthå lō misgereth ṭōfaḥ såvîv vəʿåsîthå zēr-zåhåv ləmisgartō såvîv
English: And thou shalt make unto it a border of an hand breadth round about, and thou shalt make a golden crown to the border thereof round about.

Hebrew: וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ לּ֔וֹ אַרְבַּ֖ע טַבְּעֹ֣ת זָהָ֑ב וְנָתַתָּ֙ אֶת־הַטַּבָּעֹ֔ת עַ֚ל אַרְבַּ֣ע הַפֵּאֹ֔ת אֲשֶׁ֖ר לְאַרְבַּ֥ע רַגְלָֽיו׃
Translit: vəʿåsîthå lō ʾarbaʿ ṭabbəʿōth zåhåv vənåthattå ʾeth-haṭṭabbåʿōth ʿal ʾarbaʿ happēʾōth ʾasher ləʾarbaʿ raghlåv
English: And thou shalt make for it four rings of gold, and put the rings in the four corners that are on the four feet thereof.

Hebrew: לְעֻמַּת֙ הַמִּסְגֶּ֔רֶת תִּהְיֶ֖יןָ הַטַּבָּעֹ֑ת לְבָתִּ֣ים לְבַדִּ֔ים לָשֵׂ֖את אֶת־הַשֻּׁלְחָֽן׃
Translit: ləʿummath hammisgereth tihyenå haṭṭabbåʿōth ləvåttîm ləvaddîm låsēʾth ʾeth-hasshuləḥån
English: Over against the border shall the rings be for places of the staves to bear the table.

Hebrew: וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ אֶת־הַבַּדִּים֙ עֲצֵ֣י שִׁטִּ֔ים וְצִפִּיתָ֥ אֹתָ֖ם זָהָ֑ב וְנִשָּׂא־בָ֖ם אֶת־הַשֻּׁלְחָֽן׃
Translit: vəʿåsîthå ʾeth-habbaddîm ʿatṣē shiṭṭîm vətṣippîthå ʾōthåm zåhåv vənissåʾ-våm ʾeth-hasshuləḥån
English: And thou shalt make the staves of shittim wood, and overlay them with gold, that the table may be borne with them.

Hebrew: וְעָשִׂ֨יתָ קְּעָרֹתָ֜יו וְכַפֹּתָ֗יו וּקְשׂוֹתָיו֙ וּמְנַקִּיֹּתָ֔יו אֲשֶׁ֥ר יֻסַּ֖ךְ בָּהֵ֑ן זָהָ֥ב טָה֖וֹר תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה אֹתָֽם׃
Translit: vəʿåsîthå qəʿårōthåv vəkhappōthåv ūqəsōthåv ūmənaqqiyyōthåv ʾasher yussakh båhēn zåhåv ṭåhōr taʿaseh ʾōthåm
English: And thou shalt make the dishes thereof, and spoons thereof, and covers thereof, and bowls thereof, to cover withal: of pure gold shalt thou make them.

Hebrew: וְנָתַתָּ֧ עַֽל־הַשֻּׁלְחָ֛ן לֶ֥חֶם פָּנִ֖ים לְפָנַ֥י תָּמִֽיד׃
Translit: vənåthattå ʿal-hasshuləḥån leḥem pånîm ləfånai tåmîdh
English: And thou shalt set upon the table shewbread before me alway.

Hebrew: וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ מְנֹרַ֖ת זָהָ֣ב טָה֑וֹר מִקְשָׁ֞ה תֵּעָשֶׂ֤ה הַמְּנוֹרָה֙ יְרֵכָ֣הּ וְקָנָ֔הּ גְּבִיעֶ֛יהָ כַּפְתֹּרֶ֥יהָ וּפְרָחֶ֖יהָ מִמֶּ֥נָּה יִהְיֽוּ׃
Translit: vəʿåsîthå mənōrath zåhåv ṭåhōr miqshåh tēʿåseh hammənōråh yərēkhåhh vəqånåhh gəvîʿehå kaftōrehå ūfəråḥehå mimmennåh yihyū
English: And thou shalt make a candlestick of pure gold: of beaten work shall the candlestick be made: his shaft, and his branches, his bowls, his knops, and his flowers, shall be of the same.

Hebrew: וְשִׁשָּׁ֣ה קָנִ֔ים יֹצְאִ֖ים מִצִּדֶּ֑יהָ שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה קְנֵ֣י מְנֹרָ֗ה מִצִּדָּהּ֙ הָאֶחָ֔ד וּשְׁלֹשָׁה֙ קְנֵ֣י מְנֹרָ֔ה מִצִּדָּ֖הּ הַשֵּׁנִֽי׃
Translit: vəshisshåh qånîm yōtṣəʾîm mitṣṣiddehå shəlōshåh qənē mənōråh mitṣṣiddåhh håʾeḥådh ūshəlōshåh qənē mənōråh mitṣṣiddåhh hasshēnî
English: And six branches shall come out of the sides of it; three branches of the candlestick out of the one side, and three branches of the candlestick out of the other side:

Hebrew: שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה גְ֠בִעִים מְֽשֻׁקָּדִ֞ים בַּקָּנֶ֣ה הָאֶחָד֮ כַּפְתֹּ֣ר וָפֶרַח֒ וּשְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה גְבִעִ֗ים מְשֻׁקָּדִ֛ים בַּקָּנֶ֥ה הָאֶחָ֖ד כַּפְתֹּ֣ר וָפָ֑רַח כֵּ֚ן לְשֵׁ֣שֶׁת הַקָּנִ֔ים הַיֹּצְאִ֖ים מִן־הַמְּנֹרָֽה׃
Translit: shəlōshåh ghəviʿîm məshuqqådhîm baqqåneh håʾeḥådh kaftōr våferaḥ ūshəlōshåh ghəviʿîm məshuqqådhîm baqqåneh håʾeḥådh kaftōr våfåraḥ kēn ləshēsheth haqqånîm hayyōtṣəʾîm min-hammənōråh
English: Three bowls made like unto almonds, with a knop and a flower in one branch; and three bowls made like almonds in the other branch, with a knop and a flower: so in the six branches that come out of the candlestick.

Hebrew: וּבַמְּנֹרָ֖ה אַרְבָּעָ֣ה גְבִעִ֑ים מְשֻׁקָּדִ֔ים כַּפְתֹּרֶ֖יהָ וּפְרָחֶֽיהָ׃
Translit: ūvammənōråh ʾarbåʿåh ghəviʿîm məshuqqådhîm kaftōrehå ūfəråḥehå
English: And in the candlestick shall be four bowls made like unto almonds, with their knops and their flowers.

Hebrew: וְכַפְתֹּ֡ר תַּחַת֩ שְׁנֵ֨י הַקָּנִ֜ים מִמֶּ֗נָּה וְכַפְתֹּר֙ תַּ֣חַת שְׁנֵ֤י הַקָּנִים֙ מִמֶּ֔נָּה וְכַפְתֹּ֕ר תַּחַת־שְׁנֵ֥י הַקָּנִ֖ים מִמֶּ֑נָּה לְשֵׁ֨שֶׁת֙ הַקָּנִ֔ים הַיֹּצְאִ֖ים מִן־הַמְּנֹרָֽה׃
Translit: vəkhaftōr taḥath shənē haqqånîm mimmennåh vəkhaftōr taḥath shənē haqqånîm mimmennåh vəkhaftōr taḥath-shənē haqqånîm mimmennåh ləshēsheth haqqånîm hayyōtṣəʾîm min-hammənōråh
English: And there shall be a knop under two branches of the same, and a knop under two branches of the same, and a knop under two branches of the same, according to the six branches that proceed out of the candlestick.

Hebrew: כַּפְתֹּרֵיהֶ֥ם וּקְנֹתָ֖ם מִמֶּ֣נָּה יִהְי֑וּ כֻּלָּ֛הּ מִקְשָׁ֥ה אַחַ֖ת זָהָ֥ב טָהֽוֹר׃

English: Their knops and their branches shall be of the same: all it shall be one beaten work of pure gold.

Hebrew: וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ אֶת־נֵרֹתֶ֖יהָ שִׁבְעָ֑ה וְהֶֽעֱלָה֙ אֶת־נֵ֣רֹתֶ֔יהָ וְהֵאִ֖יר עַל־עֵ֥בֶר פָּנֶֽיהָ׃
Translit: vəʿåsîthå ʾeth-nērōthehå shivʿåh vəheʿelåh ʾeth-nērōthehå vəhēʾîr ʿal-ʿēver pånehå
English: And thou shalt make the seven lamps thereof: and they shall light the lamps thereof, that they may give light over against it.

Hebrew: וּמַלְקָחֶ֥יהָ וּמַחְתֹּתֶ֖יהָ זָהָ֥ב טָהֽוֹר׃
Translit: ūmalqåḥehå ūmaḥtōthehå zåhåv ṭåhōr
English: And the tongs thereof, and the snuffdishes thereof, shall be of pure gold.

Hebrew: כִּכָּ֛ר זָהָ֥ב טָה֖וֹר יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה אֹתָ֑הּ אֵ֥ת כָּל־הַכֵּלִ֖ים הָאֵֽלֶּה׃
Translit: kikkår zåhåv ṭåhōr yaʿaseh ʾōthåhh ʾēth kål-hakkēlîm håʾēlleh
English: Of a talent of pure gold shall he make it, with all these vessels.

Hebrew: וּרְאֵ֖ה וַעֲשֵׂ֑ה בְּתַ֨בְנִיתָ֔ם אֲשֶׁר־אַתָּ֥ה מָרְאֶ֖ה בָּהָֽר׃
Translit: ūrəʾēh vaʿasēh bəthavnîthåm ʾasher-ʾattåh mårʾeh båhår
English: And look that thou make them after their pattern, which was shewed thee in the mount.

Hebrew: וְאֶת־הַמִּשְׁכָּ֥ן תַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה עֶ֣שֶׂר יְרִיעֹ֑ת שֵׁ֣שׁ מָשְׁזָ֗ר וּתְכֵ֤לֶת וְאַרְגָּמָן֙ וְתֹלַ֣עַת שָׁנִ֔י כְּרֻבִ֛ים מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה חֹשֵׁ֖ב תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה אֹתָֽם׃

English: Moreover thou shalt make the tabernacle with ten curtains of fine twined linen, and blue, and purple, and scarlet: with cherubims of cunning work shalt thou make them.

Hebrew: אֹ֣רֶךְ הַיְרִיעָ֣ה הָֽאַחַ֗ת שְׁמֹנֶ֤ה וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה וְרֹ֨חַב֙ אַרְבַּ֣ע בָּאַמָּ֔ה הַיְרִיעָ֖ה הָאֶחָ֑ת מִדָּ֥ה אַחַ֖ת לְכָל־הַיְרִיעֹֽת׃
Translit: ʾōrekh hayrîʿåh håʾaḥath shəmōneh vəʿesrîm båʾammåh vərōḥav ʾarbaʿ båʾammåh hayrîʿåh håʾeḥåth middåh ʾaḥath ləkhål-hayrîʿōth
English: The length of one curtain shall be eight and twenty cubits, and the breadth of one curtain four cubits: and every one of the curtains shall have one measure.

Hebrew: חֲמֵ֣שׁ הַיְרִיעֹ֗ת תִּֽהְיֶ֨יןָ֙ חֹֽבְרֹ֔ת אִשָּׁ֖ה אֶל־אֲחֹתָ֑הּ וְחָמֵ֤שׁ יְרִיעֹת֙ חֹֽבְרֹ֔ת אִשָּׁ֖ה אֶל־אֲחֹתָֽהּ׃
Translit: ḥamēsh hayrîʿōth tihyenå ḥōvərōth ʾisshåh ʾel-ʾaḥōthåhh vəḥåmēsh yərîʿōth ḥōvərōth ʾisshåh ʾel-ʾaḥōthåhh
English: The five curtains shall be coupled together one to another; and other five curtains shall be coupled one to another.

Hebrew: וְעָשִׂ֜יתָ לֻֽלְאֹ֣ת תְּכֵ֗לֶת עַ֣ל שְׂפַ֤ת הַיְרִיעָה֙ הָאֶחָ֔ת מִקָּצָ֖ה בַּחֹבָ֑רֶת וְכֵ֤ן תַּעֲשֶׂה֙ בִּשְׂפַ֣ת הַיְרִיעָ֔ה הַקִּ֣יצוֹנָ֔ה בַּמַּחְבֶּ֖רֶת הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃
Translit: vəʿåsîthå luləʾōth təkhēleth ʿal səfath hayrîʿåh håʾeḥåth miqqåtṣåh baḥōvåreth vəkhēn taʿaseh bisfath hayrîʿåh haqqîtṣōnåh bammaḥbereth hasshēnîth
English: And thou shalt make loops of blue upon the edge of the one curtain from the selvedge in the coupling; and likewise shalt thou make in the uttermost edge of another curtain, in the coupling of the second.

Hebrew: חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים לֻֽלָאֹ֗ת תַּעֲשֶׂה֮ בַּיְרִיעָ֣ה הָאֶחָת֒ וַחֲמִשִּׁ֣ים לֻֽלָאֹ֗ת תַּעֲשֶׂה֙ בִּקְצֵ֣ה הַיְרִיעָ֔ה אֲשֶׁ֖ר בַּמַּחְבֶּ֣רֶת הַשֵּׁנִ֑ית מַקְבִּילֹת֙ הַלֻּ֣לָאֹ֔ת אִשָּׁ֖ה אֶל־אֲחֹתָֽהּ׃
Translit: ḥamisshîm lulåʾōth taʿaseh bayrîʿåh håʾeḥåth vaḥamisshîm lulåʾōth taʿaseh biqtṣēh hayrîʿåh ʾasher bammaḥbereth hasshēnîth maqbîlōth hallulåʾōth ʾisshåh ʾel-ʾaḥōthåhh
English: Fifty loops shalt thou make in the one curtain, and fifty loops shalt thou make in the edge of the curtain that is in the coupling of the second; that the loops may take hold one of another.

Hebrew: וְעָשִׂ֕יתָ חֲמִשִּׁ֖ים קַרְסֵ֣י זָהָ֑ב וְחִבַּרְתָּ֨ אֶת־הַיְרִיעֹ֜ת אִשָּׁ֤ה אֶל־אֲחֹתָהּ֙ בַּקְּרָסִ֔ים וְהָיָ֥ה הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן אֶחָֽד׃
Translit: vəʿåsîthå ḥamisshîm qarsē zåhåv vəḥibbartå ʾeth-hayrîʿōth ʾisshåh ʾel-ʾaḥōthåhh baqqəråsîm vəhåyåh hammishkån ʾeḥådh
English: And thou shalt make fifty taches of gold, and couple the curtains together with the taches: and it shall be one tabernacle.

Hebrew: וְעָשִׂ֨יתָ֙ יְרִיעֹ֣ת עִזִּ֔ים לְאֹ֖הֶל עַל־הַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן עַשְׁתֵּי־עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה יְרִיעֹ֖ת תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה אֹתָֽם׃
Translit: vəʿåsîthå yərîʿōth ʿizzîm ləʾōhel ʿal-hammishkån ʿashtē-ʿesrēh yərîʿōth taʿaseh ʾōthåm
English: And thou shalt make curtains of goats' hair to be a covering upon the tabernacle: eleven curtains shalt thou make.

Hebrew: אֹ֣רֶךְ הַיְרִיעָ֣ה הָֽאַחַ֗ת שְׁלֹשִׁים֙ בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה וְרֹ֨חַב֙ אַרְבַּ֣ע בָּאַמָּ֔ה הַיְרִיעָ֖ה הָאֶחָ֑ת מִדָּ֣ה אַחַ֔ת לְעַשְׁתֵּ֥י עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה יְרִיעֹֽת׃
Translit: ʾōrekh hayrîʿåh håʾaḥath shəlōshîm båʾammåh vərōḥav ʾarbaʿ båʾammåh hayrîʿåh håʾeḥåth middåh ʾaḥath ləʿashtē ʿesrēh yərîʿōth
English: The length of one curtain shall be thirty cubits, and the breadth of one curtain four cubits: and the eleven curtains shall be all of one measure.

Hebrew: וְחִבַּרְתָּ֞ אֶת־חֲמֵ֤שׁ הַיְרִיעֹת֙ לְבָ֔ד וְאֶת־שֵׁ֥שׁ הַיְרִיעֹ֖ת לְבָ֑ד וְכָפַלְתָּ֙ אֶת־הַיְרִיעָ֣ה הַשִּׁשִּׁ֔ית אֶל־מ֖וּל פְּנֵ֥י הָאֹֽהֶל׃
Translit: vəḥibbartå ʾeth-ḥamēsh hayrîʿōth ləvådh vəʾeth-shēsh hayrîʿōth ləvådh vəkhåfaltå ʾeth-hayrîʿåh hasshisshîth ʾel-mūl pənē håʾōhel
English: And thou shalt couple five curtains by themselves, and six curtains by themselves, and shalt double the sixth curtain in the forefront of the tabernacle.

Hebrew: וְעָשִׂ֜יתָ חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים לֻֽלָאֹ֗ת עַ֣ל שְׂפַ֤ת הַיְרִיעָה֙ הָֽאֶחָ֔ת הַקִּיצֹנָ֖ה בַּחֹבָ֑רֶת וַחֲמִשִּׁ֣ים לֻֽלָאֹ֗ת עַ֚ל שְׂפַ֣ת הַיְרִיעָ֔ה הַחֹבֶ֖רֶת הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃
Translit: vəʿåsîthå ḥamisshîm lulåʾōth ʿal səfath hayrîʿåh håʾeḥåth haqqîtṣōnåh baḥōvåreth vaḥamisshîm lulåʾōth ʿal səfath hayrîʿåh haḥōvereth hasshēnîth
English: And thou shalt make fifty loops on the edge of the one curtain that is outmost in the coupling, and fifty loops in the edge of the curtain which coupleth the second.

Hebrew: וְעָשִׂ֛יתָ קַרְסֵ֥י נְחֹ֖שֶׁת חֲמִשִּׁ֑ים וְהֵבֵאתָ֤ אֶת־הַקְּרָסִים֙ בַּלֻּ֣לָאֹ֔ת וְחִבַּרְתָּ֥ אֶת־הָאֹ֖הֶל וְהָיָ֥ה אֶחָֽד׃
Translit: vəʿåsîthå qarsē nəḥōsheth ḥamisshîm vəhēvēʾthå ʾeth-haqqəråsîm ballulåʾōth vəḥibbartå ʾeth-håʾōhel vəhåyåh ʾeḥådh
English: And thou shalt make fifty taches of brass, and put the taches into the loops, and couple the tent together, that it may be one.

Hebrew: וְסֶ֨רַח֙ הָעֹדֵ֔ף בִּירִיעֹ֖ת הָאֹ֑הֶל חֲצִ֤י הַיְרִיעָה֙ הָעֹדֶ֔פֶת תִּסְרַ֕ח עַ֖ל אֲחֹרֵ֥י הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃
Translit: vəseraḥ håʿōdhēf bîrîʿōth håʾōhel ḥatṣî hayrîʿåh håʿōdhefeth tisraḥ ʿal ʾaḥōrē hammishkån
English: And the remnant that remaineth of the curtains of the tent, the half curtain that remaineth, shall hang over the backside of the tabernacle.

Hebrew: וְהָאַמָּ֨ה מִזֶּ֜ה וְהָאַמָּ֤ה מִזֶּה֙ בָּעֹדֵ֔ף בְּאֹ֖רֶךְ יְרִיעֹ֣ת הָאֹ֑הֶל יִהְיֶ֨ה סָר֜וּחַ עַל־צִדֵּ֧י הַמִּשְׁכָּ֛ן מִזֶּ֥ה וּמִזֶּ֖ה לְכַסֹּתֽוֹ׃
Translit: vəhåʾammåh mizzeh vəhåʾammåh mizzeh båʿōdhēf bəʾōrekh yərîʿōth håʾōhel yihyeh sårūaḥ ʿal-tṣiddē hammishkån mizzeh ūmizzeh ləkhassōthō
English: And a cubit on the one side, and a cubit on the other side of that which remaineth in the length of the curtains of the tent, it shall hang over the sides of the tabernacle on this side and on that side, to cover it.

Hebrew: וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ מִכְסֶה֙ לָאֹ֔הֶל עֹרֹ֥ת אֵילִ֖ם מְאָדָּמִ֑ים וּמִכְסֵ֛ה עֹרֹ֥ת תְּחָשִׁ֖ים מִלְמָֽעְלָה׃
Translit: vəʿåsîthå mikhseh låʾōhel ʿōrōth ʾēlim məʾåddåmîm ūmikhsēh ʿōrōth təḥåshîm milmåʿlåh
English: And thou shalt make a covering for the tent of rams' skins dyed red, and a covering above of badgers' skins.

Hebrew: וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ אֶת־הַקְּרָשִׁ֖ים לַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן עֲצֵ֥י שִׁטִּ֖ים עֹמְדִֽים׃
Translit: vəʿåsîthå ʾeth-haqqəråshîm lammishkån ʿatṣē shiṭṭîm ʿōmədhîm
English: And thou shalt make boards for the tabernacle of shittim wood standing up.

Hebrew: עֶ֥שֶׂר אַמּ֖וֹת אֹ֣רֶךְ הַקָּ֑רֶשׁ וְאַמָּה֙ וַחֲצִ֣י הָֽאַמָּ֔ה רֹ֖חַב הַקֶּ֥רֶשׁ הָאֶחָֽד׃
Translit: ʿeser ʾammōth ʾōrekh haqqåresh vəʾammåh vaḥatṣî håʾammåh rōḥav haqqeresh håʾeḥådh
English: Ten cubits shall be the length of a board, and a cubit and a half shall be the breadth of one board.

Hebrew: שְׁתֵּ֣י יָד֗וֹת לַקֶּ֨רֶשׁ֙ הָאֶחָ֔ד מְשֻׁלָּבֹ֔ת אִשָּׁ֖ה אֶל־אֲחֹתָ֑הּ כֵּ֣ן תַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה לְכֹ֖ל קַרְשֵׁ֥י הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃
Translit: shətē yådhōth laqqeresh håʾeḥådh məshullåvōth ʾisshåh ʾel-ʾaḥōthåhh kēn taʿaseh ləkhōl qarshē hammishkån
English: Two tenons shall there be in one board, set in order one against another: thus shalt thou make for all the boards of the tabernacle.

Hebrew: וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ אֶת־הַקְּרָשִׁ֖ים לַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן עֶשְׂרִ֣ים קֶ֔רֶשׁ לִפְאַ֖ת נֶ֥גְבָּה תֵימָֽנָה׃
Translit: vəʿåsîthå ʾeth-haqqəråshîm lammishkån ʿesrîm qeresh lifʾath neghbåh thēmånåh
English: And thou shalt make the boards for the tabernacle, twenty boards on the south side southward.

Hebrew: וְאַרְבָּעִים֙ אַדְנֵי־כֶ֔סֶף תַּעֲשֶׂ֕ה תַּ֖חַת עֶשְׂרִ֣ים הַקָּ֑רֶשׁ שְׁנֵ֨י אֲדָנִ֜ים תַּֽחַת־הַקֶּ֤רֶשׁ הָאֶחָד֙ לִשְׁתֵּ֣י יְדֹתָ֔יו וּשְׁנֵ֧י אֲדָנִ֛ים תַּֽחַת־הַקֶּ֥רֶשׁ הָאֶחָ֖ד לִשְׁתֵּ֥י יְדֹתָֽיו׃
Translit: vəʾarbåʿîm ʾadhnē-khesef taʿaseh taḥath ʿesrîm haqqåresh shənē ʾadhånîm taḥath-haqqeresh håʾeḥådh lishtē yədhōthåv ūshənē ʾadhånîm taḥath-haqqeresh håʾeḥådh lishtē yədhōthåv
English: And thou shalt make forty sockets of silver under the twenty boards; two sockets under one board for his two tenons, and two sockets under another board for his two tenons.

Hebrew: וּלְצֶ֧לַע הַמִּשְׁכָּ֛ן הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית לִפְאַ֣ת צָפ֑וֹן עֶשְׂרִ֖ים קָֽרֶשׁ׃
Translit: ūlətṣelaʿ hammishkån hasshēnîth lifʾath tṣåfōn ʿesrîm qåresh
English: And for the second side of the tabernacle on the north side there shall be twenty boards:

Hebrew: וְאַרְבָּעִ֥ים אַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם כָּ֑סֶף שְׁנֵ֣י אֲדָנִ֗ים תַּ֚חַת הַקֶּ֣רֶשׁ הָֽאֶחָ֔ד וּשְׁנֵ֣י אֲדָנִ֔ים תַּ֖חַת הַקֶּ֥רֶשׁ הָאֶחָֽד׃
Translit: vəʾarbåʿîm ʾadhnēhem kåsef shənē ʾadhånîm taḥath haqqeresh håʾeḥådh ūshənē ʾadhånîm taḥath haqqeresh håʾeḥådh
English: And their forty sockets of silver; two sockets under one board, and two sockets under another board.

Hebrew: וּֽלְיַרְכְּתֵ֥י הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן יָ֑מָּה תַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה שִׁשָּׁ֥ה קְרָשִֽׁים׃
Translit: ūləyarkəthē hammishkån yåmmåh taʿaseh shisshåh qəråshîm
English: And for the sides of the tabernacle westward thou shalt make six boards.

Hebrew: וּשְׁנֵ֤י קְרָשִׁים֙ תַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה לִמְקֻצְעֹ֖ת הַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן בַּיַּרְכָתָֽיִם׃
Translit: ūshənē qəråshîm taʿaseh limqutṣəʿōth hammishkån bayyarkhåthåyim
English: And two boards shalt thou make for the corners of the tabernacle in the two sides.

Hebrew: וְיִֽהְי֣וּ תֹֽאֲמִים֮ מִלְּמַטָּה֒ וְיַחְדָּ֗ו יִהְי֤וּ תַמִּים֙ עַל־רֹאשׁ֔וֹ אֶל־הַטַּבַּ֖עַת הָאֶחָ֑ת כֵּ֚ן יִהְיֶ֣ה לִשְׁנֵיהֶ֔ם לִשְׁנֵ֥י הַמִּקְצֹעֹ֖ת יִהְיֽוּ׃
Translit: vəyihyū thōʾamîm milləmaṭṭåh vəyaḥdåv yihyū thammîm ʿal-rōʾshō ʾel-haṭṭabbaʿath håʾeḥåth kēn yihyeh lishnēhem lishnē hammiqtṣōʿōth yihyū
English: And they shall be coupled together beneath, and they shall be coupled together above the head of it unto one ring: thus shall it be for them both; they shall be for the two corners.

Hebrew: וְהָיוּ֙ שְׁמֹנָ֣ה קְרָשִׁ֔ים וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֣ם כֶּ֔סֶף שִׁשָּׁ֥ה עָשָׂ֖ר אֲדָנִ֑ים שְׁנֵ֣י אֲדָנִ֗ים תַּ֚חַת הַקֶּ֣רֶשׁ הָאֶחָ֔ד וּשְׁנֵ֣י אֲדָנִ֔ים תַּ֖חַת הַקֶּ֥רֶשׁ הָאֶחָֽד׃
Translit: vəhåiū shəmōnåh qəråshîm vəʾadhnēhem kesef shisshåh ʿåsår ʾadhånîm shənē ʾadhånîm taḥath haqqeresh håʾeḥådh ūshənē ʾadhånîm taḥath haqqeresh håʾeḥådh
English: And they shall be eight boards, and their sockets of silver, sixteen sockets; two sockets under one board, and two sockets under another board.

Hebrew: וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ בְרִיחִ֖ם עֲצֵ֣י שִׁטִּ֑ים חֲמִשָּׁ֕ה לְקַרְשֵׁ֥י צֶֽלַע־הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן הָאֶחָֽד׃
Translit: vəʿåsîthå vərîḥim ʿatṣē shiṭṭîm ḥamisshåh ləqarshē tṣelaʿ-hammishkån håʾeḥådh
English: And thou shalt make bars of shittim wood; five for the boards of the one side of the tabernacle,

Hebrew: וַחֲמִשָּׁ֣ה בְרִיחִ֔ם לְקַרְשֵׁ֥י צֶֽלַע־הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן הַשֵּׁנִ֑ית וַחֲמִשָּׁ֣ה בְרִיחִ֗ם לְקַרְשֵׁי֙ צֶ֣לַע הַמִּשְׁכָּ֔ן לַיַּרְכָתַ֖יִם יָֽמָּה׃
Translit: vaḥamisshåh vərîḥim ləqarshē tṣelaʿ-hammishkån hasshēnîth vaḥamisshåh vərîḥim ləqarshē tṣelaʿ hammishkån layyarkhåthayim yåmmåh
English: And five bars for the boards of the other side of the tabernacle, and five bars for the boards of the side of the tabernacle, for the two sides westward.

Hebrew: וְהַבְּרִ֥יחַ הַתִּיכֹ֖ן בְּת֣וֹךְ הַקְּרָשִׁ֑ים מַבְרִ֕חַ מִן־הַקָּצֶ֖ה אֶל־הַקָּצֶֽה׃
Translit: vəhabbərîaḥ hattîkhōn bəthōkh haqqəråshîm mavriaḥ min-haqqåtṣeh ʾel-haqqåtṣeh
English: And the middle bar in the midst of the boards shall reach from end to end.

Hebrew: וְֽאֶת־הַקְּרָשִׁ֞ים תְּצַפֶּ֣ה זָהָ֗ב וְאֶת־טַבְּעֹֽתֵיהֶם֙ תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה זָהָ֔ב בָּתִּ֖ים לַבְּרִיחִ֑ם וְצִפִּיתָ֥ אֶת־הַבְּרִיחִ֖ם זָהָֽב׃
Translit: vəʾeth-haqqəråshîm tətṣappeh zåhåv vəʾeth-ṭabbəʿōthēhem taʿaseh zåhåv båttîm labbərîḥim vətṣippîthå ʾeth-habbərîḥim zåhåv
English: And thou shalt overlay the boards with gold, and make their rings of gold for places for the bars: and thou shalt overlay the bars with gold.

Hebrew: וַהֲקֵמֹתָ֖ אֶת־הַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן כְּמִ֨שְׁפָּט֔וֹ אֲשֶׁ֥ר הָרְאֵ֖יתָ בָּהָֽר׃
Translit: vahaqēmōthå ʾeth-hammishkån kəmishpåṭō ʾasher hårʾēthå båhår
English: And thou shalt rear up the tabernacle according to the fashion thereof which was shewed thee in the mount.

Hebrew: וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ פָרֹ֗כֶת תְּכֵ֧לֶת וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן וְתוֹלַ֥עַת שָׁנִ֖י וְשֵׁ֣שׁ מָשְׁזָ֑ר מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה חֹשֵׁ֛ב יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה אֹתָ֖הּ כְּרֻבִֽים׃
Translit: vəʿåsîthå fårōkheth təkhēleth vəʾargåmån vəthōlaʿath shånî vəshēsh måshzår maʿasēh ḥōshēv yaʿaseh ʾōthåhh kəruvîm
English: And thou shalt make a vail of blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine twined linen of cunning work: with cherubims shall it be made:

Hebrew: וְנָתַתָּ֣ה אֹתָ֗הּ עַל־אַרְבָּעָה֙ עַמּוּדֵ֣י שִׁטִּ֔ים מְצֻפִּ֣ים זָהָ֔ב וָוֵיהֶ֖ם זָהָ֑ב עַל־אַרְבָּעָ֖ה אַדְנֵי־כָֽסֶף׃
Translit: vənåthattåh ʾōthåhh ʿal-ʾarbåʿåh ʿammūdhē shiṭṭîm mətṣuppîm zåhåv våvēhem zåhåv ʿal-ʾarbåʿåh ʾadhnē-khåsef
English: And thou shalt hang it upon four pillars of shittim wood overlaid with gold: their hooks shall be of gold, upon the four sockets of silver.

Hebrew: וְנָתַתָּ֣ה אֶת־הַפָּרֹכֶת֮ תַּ֣חַת הַקְּרָסִים֒ וְהֵבֵאתָ֥ שָׁ֨מָּה֙ מִבֵּ֣ית לַפָּרֹ֔כֶת אֵ֖ת אֲר֣וֹן הָעֵד֑וּת וְהִבְדִּילָ֤ה הַפָּרֹ֨כֶת֙ לָכֶ֔ם בֵּ֣ין הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ וּבֵ֖ין קֹ֥דֶשׁ הַקֳּדָשִֽׁים׃
Translit: vənåthattåh ʾeth-happårōkheth taḥath haqqəråsîm vəhēvēʾthå shåmmåh mibbēth lappårōkheth ʾēth ʾarōn håʿēdhūth vəhivdîlåh happårōkheth låkhem bēn haqqōdhesh ūvēn qōdhesh haqqodhåshîm
English: And thou shalt hang up the vail under the taches, that thou mayest bring in thither within the vail the ark of the testimony: and the vail shall divide unto you between the holy place and the most holy.

Hebrew: וְנָתַתָּ֙ אֶת־הַכַּפֹּ֔רֶת עַ֖ל אֲר֣וֹן הָעֵדֻ֑ת בְּקֹ֖דֶשׁ הַקֳּדָשִֽׁים׃
Translit: vənåthattå ʾeth-hakkappōreth ʿal ʾarōn håʿēdhuth bəqōdhesh haqqodhåshîm
English: And thou shalt put the mercy seat upon the ark of the testimony in the most holy place.

Hebrew: וְשַׂמְתָּ֤ אֶת־הַשֻּׁלְחָן֙ מִח֣וּץ לַפָּרֹ֔כֶת וְאֶת־הַמְּנֹרָה֙ נֹ֣כַח הַשֻּׁלְחָ֔ן עַ֛ל צֶ֥לַע הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן תֵּימָ֑נָה וְהַ֨שֻּׁלְחָ֔ן תִּתֵּ֖ן עַל־צֶ֥לַע צָפֽוֹן׃
Translit: vəsamtå ʾeth-hasshuləḥån miḥūtṣ lappårōkheth vəʾeth-hammənōråh nōkhaḥ hasshuləḥån ʿal tṣelaʿ hammishkån tēmånåh vəhasshuləḥån tittēn ʿal-tṣelaʿ tṣåfōn
English: And thou shalt set the table without the vail, and the candlestick over against the table on the side of the tabernacle toward the south: and thou shalt put the table on the north side.

Hebrew: וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ מָסָךְ֙ לְפֶ֣תַח הָאֹ֔הֶל תְּכֵ֧לֶת וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן וְתוֹלַ֥עַת שָׁנִ֖י וְשֵׁ֣שׁ מָשְׁזָ֑ר מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה רֹקֵֽם׃
Translit: vəʿåsîthå måsåkh ləfethaḥ håʾōhel təkhēleth vəʾargåmån vəthōlaʿath shånî vəshēsh måshzår maʿasēh rōqēm
English: And thou shalt make an hanging for the door of the tent, of blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine twined linen, wrought with needlework.

Hebrew: וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ לַמָּסָ֗ךְ חֲמִשָּׁה֙ עַמּוּדֵ֣י שִׁטִּ֔ים וְצִפִּיתָ֤ אֹתָם֙ זָהָ֔ב וָוֵיהֶ֖ם זָהָ֑ב וְיָצַקְתָּ֣ לָהֶ֔ם חֲמִשָּׁ֖ה אַדְנֵ֥י נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃
Translit: vəʿåsîthå lammåsåkh ḥamisshåh ʿammūdhē shiṭṭîm vətṣippîthå ʾōthåm zåhåv våvēhem zåhåv vəyåtṣaqtå låhem ḥamisshåh ʾadhnē nəḥōsheth
English: And thou shalt make for the hanging five pillars of shittim wood, and overlay them with gold, and their hooks shall be of gold: and thou shalt cast five sockets of brass for them.

Hebrew: וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ אֶת־הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ עֲצֵ֣י שִׁטִּ֑ים חָמֵשׁ֩ אַמּ֨וֹת אֹ֜רֶךְ וְחָמֵ֧שׁ אַמּ֣וֹת רֹ֗חַב רָב֤וּעַ יִהְיֶה֙ הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ וְשָׁלֹ֥שׁ אַמּ֖וֹת קֹמָתֽוֹ׃
Translit: vəʿåsîthå ʾeth-hammizbēaḥ ʿatṣē shiṭṭîm ḥåmēsh ʾammōth ʾōrekh vəḥåmēsh ʾammōth rōḥav råvūaʿ yihyeh hammizbēaḥ vəshålōsh ʾammōth qōmåthō
English: And thou shalt make an altar of shittim wood, five cubits long, and five cubits broad; the altar shall be foursquare: and the height thereof shall be three cubits.

Hebrew: וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ קַרְנֹתָ֗יו עַ֚ל אַרְבַּ֣ע פִּנֹּתָ֔יו מִמֶּ֖נּוּ תִּהְיֶ֣יןָ קַרְנֹתָ֑יו וְצִפִּיתָ֥ אֹת֖וֹ נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃
Translit: vəʿåsîthå qarnōthåv ʿal ʾarbaʿ pinnōthåv mimmennū tihyenå qarnōthåv vətṣippîthå ʾōthō nəḥōsheth
English: And thou shalt make the horns of it upon the four corners thereof: his horns shall be of the same: and thou shalt overlay it with brass.

Hebrew: וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ סִּֽירֹתָיו֙ לְדַשְּׁנ֔וֹ וְיָעָיו֙ וּמִזְרְקֹתָ֔יו וּמִזְלְגֹתָ֖יו וּמַחְתֹּתָ֑יו לְכָל־כֵּלָ֖יו תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃
Translit: vəʿåsîthå sîrōthåv lədhasshənō vəyåʿåv ūmizrəqōthåv ūmizləghōthåv ūmaḥtōthåv ləkhål-kēlåv taʿaseh nəḥōsheth
English: And thou shalt make his pans to receive his ashes, and his shovels, and his basons, and his fleshhooks, and his firepans: all the vessels thereof thou shalt make of brass.

Hebrew: וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ לּוֹ֙ מִכְבָּ֔ר מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה רֶ֣שֶׁת נְחֹ֑שֶׁת וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ עַל־הָרֶ֗שֶׁת אַרְבַּע֙ טַבְּעֹ֣ת נְחֹ֔שֶׁת עַ֖ל אַרְבַּ֥ע קְצוֹתָֽיו׃
Translit: vəʿåsîthå lō mikhbår maʿasēh resheth nəḥōsheth vəʿåsîthå ʿal-håresheth ʾarbaʿ ṭabbəʿōth nəḥōsheth ʿal ʾarbaʿ qətṣōthåv
English: And thou shalt make for it a grate of network of brass; and upon the net shalt thou make four brasen rings in the four corners thereof.

Hebrew: וְנָתַתָּ֣ה אֹתָ֗הּ תַּ֛חַת כַּרְכֹּ֥ב הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ מִלְּמָ֑טָּה וְהָיְתָ֣ה הָרֶ֔שֶׁת עַ֖ד חֲצִ֥י הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃
Translit: vənåthattåh ʾōthåhh taḥath karkōv hammizbēaḥ milləmåṭṭåh vəhåythåh håresheth ʿadh ḥatṣî hammizbēaḥ
English: And thou shalt put it under the compass of the altar beneath, that the net may be even to the midst of the altar.

Hebrew: וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ בַדִּים֙ לַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ בַּדֵּ֖י עֲצֵ֣י שִׁטִּ֑ים וְצִפִּיתָ֥ אֹתָ֖ם נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃
Translit: vəʿåsîthå vaddîm lammizbēaḥ baddē ʿatṣē shiṭṭîm vətṣippîthå ʾōthåm nəḥōsheth
English: And thou shalt make staves for the altar, staves of shittim wood, and overlay them with brass.

Hebrew: וְהוּבָ֥א אֶת־בַּדָּ֖יו בַּטַּבָּעֹ֑ת וְהָי֣וּ הַבַּדִּ֗ים עַל־שְׁתֵּ֛י צַלְעֹ֥ת הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ בִּשְׂאֵ֥ת אֹתֽוֹ׃
Translit: vəhūvåʾ ʾeth-baddåv baṭṭabbåʿōth vəhåiū habbaddîm ʿal-shətē tṣalʿōth hammizbēaḥ bisʾēth ʾōthō
English: And the staves shall be put into the rings, and the staves shall be upon the two sides of the altar, to bear it.

Hebrew: נְב֥וּב לֻחֹ֖ת תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה אֹת֑וֹ כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר הֶרְאָ֥ה אֹתְךָ֛ בָּהָ֖ר כֵּ֥ן יַעֲשֽׂוּ׃
Translit: nəvūv luḥōth taʿaseh ʾōthō kaʾasher herʾåh ʾōthəkhå båhår kēn yaʿasū
English: Hollow with boards shalt thou make it: as it was shewed thee in the mount, so shall they make it.

Hebrew: וְעָשִׂ֕יתָ אֵ֖ת חֲצַ֣ר הַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן לִפְאַ֣ת נֶֽגֶב־תֵּ֠ימָנָה קְלָעִ֨ים לֶחָצֵ֜ר שֵׁ֣שׁ מָשְׁזָ֗ר מֵאָ֤ה בָֽאַמָּה֙ אֹ֔רֶךְ לַפֵּאָ֖ה הָאֶחָֽת׃
Translit: vəʿåsîthå ʾēth ḥatṣar hammishkån lifʾath neghev-tēmånåh qəlåʿîm leḥåtṣēr shēsh måshzår mēʾåh våʾammåh ʾōrekh lappēʾåh håʾeḥåth
English: And thou shalt make the court of the tabernacle: for the south side southward there shall be hangings for the court of fine twined linen of an hundred cubits long for one side:

Hebrew: וְעַמֻּדָ֣יו עֶשְׂרִ֔ים וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֥ם עֶשְׂרִ֖ים נְחֹ֑שֶׁת וָוֵ֧י הָעַמֻּדִ֛ים וַחֲשֻׁקֵיהֶ֖ם כָּֽסֶף׃
Translit: vəʿammudhåv ʿesrîm vəʾadhnēhem ʿesrîm nəḥōsheth våvē håʿammudhîm vaḥashuqēhem kåsef
English: And the twenty pillars thereof and their twenty sockets shall be of brass; the hooks of the pillars and their fillets shall be of silver.

Hebrew: וְכֵ֨ן לִפְאַ֤ת צָפוֹן֙ בָּאֹ֔רֶךְ קְלָעִ֖ים מֵ֣אָה אֹ֑רֶךְ ועמדו וְעַמּוּדָ֣יו עֶשְׂרִ֗ים וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֤ם עֶשְׂרִים֙ נְחֹ֔שֶׁת וָוֵ֧י הָֽעַמֻּדִ֛ים וַחֲשֻׁקֵיהֶ֖ם כָּֽסֶף׃
Translit: vəkhēn lifʾath tṣåfōn båʾōrekh qəlåʿîm mēʾåh ʾōrekh vʿmdhv vəʿammūdhåv ʿesrîm vəʾadhnēhem ʿesrîm nəḥōsheth våvē håʿammudhîm vaḥashuqēhem kåsef
English: And likewise for the north side in length there shall be hangings of an hundred cubits long, and his twenty pillars and their twenty sockets of brass; the hooks of the pillars and their fillets of silver.

Hebrew: וְרֹ֤חַב הֶֽחָצֵר֙ לִפְאַת־יָ֔ם קְלָעִ֖ים חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים אַמָּ֑ה עַמֻּדֵיהֶ֣ם עֲשָׂרָ֔ה וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם עֲשָׂרָֽה׃
Translit: vərōḥav heḥåtṣēr lifʾath-yåm qəlåʿîm ḥamisshîm ʾammåh ʿammudhēhem ʿasåråh vəʾadhnēhem ʿasåråh
English: And for the breadth of the court on the west side shall be hangings of fifty cubits: their pillars ten, and their sockets ten.

Hebrew: וְרֹ֣חַב הֶֽחָצֵ֗ר לִפְאַ֛ת קֵ֥דְמָה מִזְרָ֖חָה חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים אַמָּֽה׃
Translit: vərōḥav heḥåtṣēr lifʾath qēdhəmåh mizråḥåh ḥamisshîm ʾammåh
English: And the breadth of the court on the east side eastward shall be fifty cubits.

Hebrew: וַחֲמֵ֨שׁ עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה אַמָּ֛ה קְלָעִ֖ים לַכָּתֵ֑ף עַמֻּדֵיהֶ֣ם שְׁלֹשָׁ֔ה וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃
Translit: vaḥamēsh ʿesrēh ʾammåh qəlåʿîm lakkåthēf ʿammudhēhem shəlōshåh vəʾadhnēhem shəlōshåh
English: The hangings of one side of the gate shall be fifteen cubits: their pillars three, and their sockets three.

Hebrew: וְלַכָּתֵף֙ הַשֵּׁנִ֔ית חְמֵ֥שׁ עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה קְלָעִ֑ים עַמֻּדֵיהֶ֣ם שְׁלֹשָׁ֔ה וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃
Translit: vəlakkåthēf hasshēnîth ḥəmēsh ʿesrēh qəlåʿîm ʿammudhēhem shəlōshåh vəʾadhnēhem shəlōshåh
English: And on the other side shall be hangings fifteen cubits: their pillars three, and their sockets three.

Hebrew: וּלְשַׁ֨עַר הֶֽחָצֵ֜ר מָסָ֣ךְ עֶשְׂרִ֣ים אַמָּ֗ה תְּכֵ֨לֶת וְאַרְגָּמָ֜ן וְתוֹלַ֧עַת שָׁנִ֛י וְשֵׁ֥שׁ מָשְׁזָ֖ר מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה רֹקֵ֑ם עַמֻּֽדֵיהֶם֙ אַרְבָּעָ֔ה וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם אַרְבָּעָֽה׃
Translit: ūləshaʿar heḥåtṣēr måsåkh ʿesrîm ʾammåh təkhēleth vəʾargåmån vəthōlaʿath shånî vəshēsh måshzår maʿasēh rōqēm ʿammudhēhem ʾarbåʿåh vəʾadhnēhem ʾarbåʿåh
English: And for the gate of the court shall be an hanging of twenty cubits, of blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine twined linen, wrought with needlework: and their pillars shall be four, and their sockets four.

Hebrew: כָּל־עַמּוּדֵ֨י הֶֽחָצֵ֤ר סָבִיב֙ מְחֻשָּׁקִ֣ים כֶּ֔סֶף וָוֵיהֶ֖ם כָּ֑סֶף וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃
Translit: kål-ʿammūdhē heḥåtṣēr såvîv məḥusshåqîm kesef våvēhem kåsef vəʾadhnēhem nəḥōsheth
English: All the pillars round about the court shall be filleted with silver; their hooks shall be of silver, and their sockets of brass.

Hebrew: אֹ֣רֶךְ הֶֽחָצֵר֩ מֵאָ֨ה בָֽאַמָּ֜ה וְרֹ֣חַב חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים בַּחֲמִשִּׁ֗ים וְקֹמָ֛ה חָמֵ֥שׁ אַמּ֖וֹת שֵׁ֣שׁ מָשְׁזָ֑ר וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃
Translit: ʾōrekh heḥåtṣēr mēʾåh våʾammåh vərōḥav ḥamisshîm baḥamisshîm vəqōmåh ḥåmēsh ʾammōth shēsh måshzår vəʾadhnēhem nəḥōsheth
English: The length of the court shall be an hundred cubits, and the breadth fifty every where, and the height five cubits of fine twined linen, and their sockets of brass.

Hebrew: לְכֹל֙ כְּלֵ֣י הַמִּשְׁכָּ֔ן בְּכֹ֖ל עֲבֹדָת֑וֹ וְכָל־יְתֵדֹתָ֛יו וְכָל־יִתְדֹ֥ת הֶחָצֵ֖ר נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃
Translit: ləkhōl kəlē hammishkån bəkhōl ʿavōdhåthō vəkhål-yəthēdhōthåv vəkhål-yithdhōth heḥåtṣēr nəḥōsheth
English: All the vessels of the tabernacle in all the service thereof, and all the pins thereof, and all the pins of the court, shall be of brass.
